Posts.Content: Jul 20, 2013 10:23PM Charnyaramanh wrote: Hi All, Found a clinic which offers lymphedema therapy, however dint find it very promising... on asking a lot of questions the doctor seemed to get a little defensive. They dont have a lymphedema therapist as such but do a 10day treatment which involves using lymphedema  compression pump and bandaging.   the therapist she seemed very mechanical as if she is following a standard procedure...kind of like one size fits all... I dont know should I go with it or wait and find a better resource... Confused Charanya
